channel.title: Need the coding for Menu including: Owner, Server Ip, etc
channel.description:
Hi, I'm looking for the code that shows a list, or rather menu in the top left corner [i][b]Or in the middle at the top[/b][/i] of your screen including details such as:
Owner ServerIP ServerName (i think) Number of Players Online "Message"
If anyone could give me a URL or paste the coding, I would really appreciate it.
Thanks , ~ Play N Skillz

item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

Hi, I’m looking for the code that shows a list, or rather menu in the top left corner Or in the middle at the top of your screen including details such as:

Owner
ServerIP
ServerName (i think)
Number of Players Online
“Message”

If anyone could give me a URL or paste the coding, I would really appreciate it.
